content: अंबष्ठः {@--1@} The offspring of a man of the Brāhmaṇa and a woman of the Vaiśya tribe; ब्राह्मणाद्वैश्यकन्यायामंबष्ठो नाम जायते <ls>Ms. 10. 8</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 10.">13</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 10.">15</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 91.</ls> (According to <ls>Ms. 10. 47</ls> the duty of an अंबष्ठ is the curing of diseases; अंबष्ठानां चिकित्सितं). {@--2@} An elephant-driver. {@--3@} (<ab>pl.</ab>) <ab>N.</ab> of a country and its inhabitants (they seem to have occupied the country to the east of Tāk, comprising the modern district of Lahore). --ष्ठा <ab>N.</ab> of several plants: ({%a%}) गणिका, यूथिका (<ab>Mar.</ab> जुई); ({%b%}) पाठा (<ab>Mar.</ab> पाहाडमूळ). ({%c%}) चुक्रिका (<ab>Mar.</ab> चुका); ({%d%}) another plant (<ab>Mar.</ab> अंबाडा). --ष्ठा, --ष्ठी An Ambaṣṭha woman.
